spec_data.Name: perl-Dist-Zilla-Plugin-PodWeaver
spec_data.Description:
PodWeaver is the bridge between Dist::Zilla and Pod::Weaver. It rips
apart your kinda-POD and reconstructs it as a boring old real POD.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:11:44 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Weave your POD together from configuration and Dist::Zilla
